meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of slang or jargon.
meanings.sent1: The argotic language used by teenagers can be difficult for adults to understand.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the argotic expressions used by the group of friends.
meanings.sent3: The argotic terms they used made the conversation lively and fun.
meanings.sent4: His argotic way of speaking painted a colorful picture of his personality.
meanings.sent5: The argotic phrases added a unique flair to the dialogue.

meanings.definition: Using or containing slang or jargon.
meanings.sent1: The argotic words in the text were unfamiliar to me.
meanings.sent2: The argotic phrases in the song resonated with the younger audience.
meanings.sent3: She found the argotic expressions amusing and intriguing.
meanings.sent4: His argotic speech was like a secret code only a few could decipher.
meanings.sent5: The argotic terms added a playful touch to the conversation.
